trans-unit.source: Takes a string and prefixes all linefeed characters ( Chr(10) ) with a carriage return character ( Chr(13) ).

seg-source.mrk: Takes a string and prefixes all linefeed characters ( Chr(10) ) with a carriage return character ( Chr(13) ).

target.mrk: Takes a string and prefixes all linefeed characters ( Chr(10) ) with a carriage return character ( Chr(13) ).

trans-unit.source: Returns the string with all instances of linefeed characters ( @LF ) prefixed with a carriage return character ( @CR ).

seg-source.mrk: Returns the string with all instances of linefeed characters ( @LF ) prefixed with a carriage return character ( @CR ).

target.mrk: Returns the string with all instances of linefeed characters ( @LF ) prefixed with a carriage return character ( @CR ).

trans-unit.source: Add the carriage return charcter to all the line feed characters in the string.

seg-source.mrk: Add the carriage return charcter to all the line feed characters in the string.

target.mrk: Add the carriage return charcter to all the line feed characters in the string.
